sent.orig: Virtue-ability bases: The virtue-ability bases are the multiples of the virtual base.
sent.trans: 德能基数：德能基数是虚定基数的倍数。

sent.orig: V is virtue, virtue is a jewel of great price.
sent.trans: 是美德，美德是价值连城的珠玉。

sent.orig: The study of governmental virtue expands multiple application on virtue as an individual concept.
sent.trans: 政府德性的研究，是对德性这一作为个体属性的品质概念所进行的多元运用。

sent.orig: Beauty is virtue's previous existence, while beauty is virtue's after-life.
Repay resentment with fairness and justiceand repay virtue with virtue.
sent.trans: 孔子说：“用公平正直来对待怨恨，以恩德来报答恩德。”
